name: Aluminum Corporation of China Limited
description: Aluminum Corporation of China Limited, also known as Chalco, is a leading player in the aluminum industry and one of the largest producers of aluminum in the world. Established in 2001 and headquartered in Beijing, China, Chalco is primarily engaged in the production of alumina, primary aluminum, and aluminum alloy products. The company plays a crucial role in the global aluminum supply chain, contributing to various sectors such as construction, transportation, packaging, and consumer goods. With a strong commitment to sustainability, Chalco emphasizes environmentally friendly practices in its production processes, including energy-efficient technologies and waste reduction initiatives. As part of China's push towards industrial modernization, Chalco is also investing in research and development to enhance its product offerings and improve operational efficiency. Additionally, the company is focused on expanding its international presence through strategic partnerships and investments in overseas projects. Chalco's mission is to lead the industry in innovation while maintaining a strong dedication to corporate social responsibility and ecological sustainability.
